msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist; names of the owners; name of the King Ḫaylä Śǝllase in the colophon. A group of lines, alternating with black lines, in the incipit page of Texts I, II, and in the incipit of Text III; incipit (2 lines) of each sub section (homilies) in Text I and of each miracle in Text II; the word sälam in Text III; initial line of the colophon. Elements of Ethiopian numerals, of punctuations signs and of text dividers; marginal notes or their decorative elements; elements of quire marks.

msItem.note: - About the literature on John the Baptist, cp. EAE III, 288-91.
- Text I is a compilation of several homilies on John the Baptist.
- In Text II, all the miracles are numbered; the numerals for Miracles 1, 2, 3, 5 are written in the left margin of the column.
- The word እስራኤል፡ (ʾƎsraʾel) is usually written ፳ኤል፡ (20-ʾel) (e.g., fols. 46va l.6, 65va l.3).
- Compressed script used for Text III (esp. fols. 89vb-90va).

msItem.colophon: Fol. 89ra: ተፈጸመ፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ አመ፡ ፪ለጳጉሜን፡ በ፲ወ፱፻፷ወ፪ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ በ፴ወ፱ዘመነ፡ መንግሥቱ፡ ለንጉሥነ፡ ኃይለ፡ ሥላሴ፡ በእደ፡ ጸሐፊሁ፡ አለቃ፡ ድራር፡ ወልደ፡ ቂርቆስ፡ ዘብሔረ፡ ልጋት፡ ወዘአጽሐፈቶ፡ ወይዘሮ፡ ምሕረታ፡ ወልደ፡ ኪዳን፡ በ፻ወ፳ብሩር፡ ወወሀበቶ፡ ለታቦተ፡ ዮሐንሰ፡ ደብረ፡ ማዕጾ፨ ዘሠረቆ፡ ወዘፈሐቆ፡ ርጉመ፡ ይኩን፡ ከመ፡ አርዮስ፡ በሥልጣነ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ወጳውሎስ፡ ለይኩን፡ ለይኩን፡ ለይኩን፨Fol. 89ra: This book was completed on the 2nd Ṗagumen, in the year of mercy 1962, in 39th year of the reign of our King Ḫaylä Śǝllase, by the hands of his scribe ʾaläqa Dǝrar Wäldä Qirqos, of the region of Lǝgat. And the one who let him write (was) wäyzäro Mǝḥräta Wäldä Kidan, for 120 Bǝrur, and she gave it to the tabot of Yoḥannǝs of Däbrä Maʿṣo. Anyone who stole it, or who erased it, be cursed like Arius by authority of Peter and Paul. So be it, so be it, so be it. 2nd Ṗagumen, 1962 of the year of mercy (= 6 September 1969 A.D.) is indicated as the date of the completion of the manuscript. Lǝgat is the place and church (of Qirqos) located close to Zälambäsa.

person.persName: According to the colophon, wäyzäro Mǝḥräta Wäldä Kidan was the commissioner and donor of the book.
Several individuals (ʾabunä Gäbrä Yoḥannǝs on fol. 24ra, Wälättä Śǝllase on fol. 80va, Wälättä Gäbrʾel on fol. 79va, etc.) are mentioned in several supplication formulas.
